pages.text: This is a collection of practical commands that will prove invaluable for navigating the vast expanse of Westeros.

$(li)$(l)/warp <location>$()$(br)Lets you travel to any location in Westeros with ease.  For example, $(c:/warp winterfell)/warp winterfell$(/c) takes you to the castle. $(br)$(li)$(l)/listwarps$()$(br) This command lists all the warps we have, across every world. $(br)$(li)$(l)/mw tp <worldname>$()$(br) This command warps you to the spawn of one of our worlds.
$(li)$(l)/mw list$()$(br) Lists all available worlds to warp to. $(br)$(li)$(l)/mw spawn$()$(br) Warps to the spawn of the current world you are in.

$(li)$(l)/tpa <player_name>$()$(br) Teleport to a player. They must accept your request. $(br)$(li)$(l)/tpaccept$()$(br) Accept a teleportation request to you. $(br)$(li)$(l)/tpdeny$()$(br) Request someone teleport to you.
